text: neohuileul wihae daejileul ansigcheo lo hasa haneul-eul jibung-eulo hago neohuileul changjohasa gajang aleumdaun hyeong chelo jieusyeoss-eumyeo joh-eun yangsig-eul bu yeohasin bun-i balo hananim-isila neohui junim hananim-eun geuleohasinilageuleomeulo man-yuui junim-isin hananim-iyeo chugbog-eul bad-eusoseo
